original: 劉勳妻子。因王宋無子，又有新歡司馬氏，打算休妻改納司馬氏。王宋黯然離開，路上作詩二首。曹丕亦就此事詠詩。
text: Liu Xun's wife. Because Wang Song had no children and there was a new Sima clan, he planned to divorce his wife and change to Nasima clan. Wang Song left sadly and composed two poems on the road. Cao Pi also chanted poems on this matter.
